text: The Barbarian and the Geisha is a 1958 American biographical drama movie directed by John Huston and starring John Wayne, Eiko Ando, Sam Jaffe, S≈ç Yamamura, Fuyukichi Maki. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1958 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston
